Topic.Title: 58% of Americans think that the stock market will drop by more than 30% in the next 12 months

Message.Msg: clearly a sign it is time to buy, when 68% think the market is heading up, its time to sell. You must lose a lot of money trading

Topic.Title: ......Fed's Plosser wants to start towards QE exit

Message.Msg: agree...but doubt it happens as obama will not let bernanke do anything that would raise interest rates and thus add to the deficit before the '14 election.

Message.Title: Nice Day IBM
Message.Msg: Still a lot left in this Bull and IBM a bargain.
